item.title: Causal inference according to Judea Pearl
item.description: Reading plan for the 2020 statistics tea club. Starting from January we will go through The Book of Why by Judea Pearl, a (mostly) non-technical introduction to causal inference with graphical models. Order the book from Bookdepository or Amazon Date Time Location Topic January 30th 2020 12.15-13.15 DMI, Spiegelgasse 1, Room 06.011 Intro, chapters 1 & 2 February 20th 2020 12.
